content.query:
CREATE PROCEDURE modelo_transacciones.SP_Manage_Dim_Tiempo
AS BEGIN

    CREATE TABLE #Numeros (
        Numero int
    )

    DECLARE @MaxNum int = 10000; -- Adjust the value as needed

    DECLARE @Contador int = 1;

    WHILE  @Contador <= @MaxNum 
    BEGIN
        INSERT INTO #Numbers (Number) VALUES (@Contador);
        SET @Contador = @Contador + 1;
    END;

    -- Generate DimDate values
    DECLARE @StartDate date = '2021-01-01';
    DECLARE @EndDate date = '2023-12-31';

    INSERT INTO modelo_transacciones.Dim_Tiempo (Date, Year, Quarter, Month, Day, Weekday, Weekday_Number, Is_Weekend, Day_Of_Year, Date_String)
    SELECT
        DATEADD(DAY, Number - 1, @StartDate),
        DATEPART(YEAR, DATEADD(DAY, Number - 1, @StartDate)),
        DATEPART(QUARTER, DATEADD(DAY, Number - 1, @StartDate)),
        DATEPART(MONTH, DATEADD(DAY, Number - 1, @StartDate)),
        DATEPART(DAY, DATEADD(DAY, Number - 1, @StartDate)),
        DATENAME(WEEKDAY, DATEADD(DAY, Number - 1, @StartDate)),
        DATEPART(WEEKDAY, DATEADD(DAY, Number - 1, @StartDate)),
        CASE WHEN DATEPART(WEEKDAY, DATEADD(DAY, Number - 1, @StartDate)) IN (6, 7) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END,
        DATEPART(DAYOFYEAR, DATEADD(DAY, Number - 1, @StartDate)),
        CONVERT(varchar(10), DATEADD(DAY, Number - 1, @StartDate), 120)
    FROM Numbers
    WHERE DATEADD(DAY, Number - 1, @StartDate) <= @EndDate;


END

--exec modelo_transacciones.SP_Manage_Dim_Tiempo
--SELECT * FROM DimDate;
